cells.data:
When trying to access the dashboard, an error "Authorization token is missing. Click here to reload page." is displayed.
This is due to a self-signed cert.

Solution for FF as per: https://access.redhat.com/documentation/en-us/red_hat_codeready_workspaces/2.4/html-single/end-user_guide/index#adding_certificates_to_firefox

# general check
gradle
# when working
gradle wrapper
# when successful, this should now work:
./gradlew
